InlineMeasurements.annotation:
This task will read eigevectors produced by chroma_eig/laplace_eigs . Not used in this test, instead use create colorvecs below.
EIGENINFO_LIME_COLORVEC_READ_NAMED_OBJECT

elem.annotation: Iterate the smearing operator to produce near eigenvectors
elem.Name: CREATE_COLORVECS

elem.annotation: For testing purposes. Save this copy in LIME format.
elem.Name: QIO_WRITE_NAMED_OBJECT

elem.annotation: For testing purposes. Copy this map object. In this case, it will be saved as a disk map object.
elem.Name: COPY_MAP_OBJECT

elem.annotation: The named_object is erased, but the disk file remains.
elem.Name: ERASE_NAMED_OBJECT

PropMapObject.annotation: Write to a disk. Later, will read back into memory as a test. Will remove original copy.

elem.annotation: For testing purposes. Copy this map object back into a memory object.
elem.Name: COPY_MAP_OBJECT

elem.annotation: The named_object is erased, but the disk file remains.
elem.Name: ERASE_NAMED_OBJECT

PropMapObject.annotation: Write to a disk. Later, will read back into memory as a test. Will remove original copy.
